tooltip.useless_tool_1: 此工具無法開採任何東西。
tooltip.useless_hoe_1: 這把鋤頭什麼也做不了。
tooltip.useless_weapon_1: 此武器不能傷害任何東西。
tooltip.useless_tool_2: It can only be used for crafting.
desc.item.pt.coal_piece: Cooks a single item. Allows for more efficient fuel use when cooking anything in a Furnace.
desc.item.pt.charcoal_piece: Cooks a single item. Allows for more efficient fuel use when cooking anything in a Furnace.
desc.item.pt.diamond_apple:
Gives the same effects as a tier 2 Golden Apple. 

Differences being it gives more Absorption, and the effects have a shorter duration. 

As an added bonus, you can eat multiple of these and have the buff durations stack.
desc.item.pt.emerald_apple:
Gives the same effects as the Diamond Apple. 

Differences being the stats are higher level, last longer, and you also get Strength. 

As an added bonus, you can eat multiple of these and have the buff durations stack.
desc.item.pt.watering_can: Increases the growth rate of plants in a 3x3 area. \n\nCan also be used to moisten Farmland and spread Grass/Mycelium.
desc.item.pt.magnet: Sucks in items and experience within a certain radius to you.
desc.item.pt.nightvision_goggles: Allows the wearer to see clearly in the dark.
